title: House of Meleager
description: The so-called "House of Meleager" (VI.9.2) is a domus in Pompeii of the "Samnite" type that was excavated first in 1829, then again in 1836 and 1966. The interior boasts rich painted decoration corresponding to Mau's first, third, and fourth styles.

properties.description: Representative location based on geometry derived from an OpenStreetMap way.
properties.title: OSM location of so-called "House of Meleager"
